description: Redevelopment of the site through the erection of part 5 and part 6 storey building for the purpose of mix use of development comprising a total of 88 units (14 x 1 Bed, 44 x 2 bed, 20 x 3 bed, 10 x 4 bed) 700 square metres of Class A1 (Retail), 914 square metres of B8 (warehouse and distribution), 1643 square metres of B1 (Office) together with 1 lorry loading bay, 44 car parking spaces, 12 disabled car parking spaces, 108 cycle parking spaces; the proposal includes the demolition of all existing buildings on the subject site.
